scenario_text.value: This is it, Takuma.
...Right.
Whatever happens next, I’m ready for it.
(The way he says that...)

(It’s because he knows we may end up fighting
Aoi, isn’t it?)

(And I mean, I’m prepared for the same thing.
To save our world, to make it back home,)

(we can’t let Aoi kill Miyuki. But I have to
wonder...)

(If it really comes down to it, will I be
able to follow through?)
(How should I respond to Kaito?)
You mean fighting Aoi?
You’ll stop Aoi, right?
I don’t know if I am.
You mean fighting Aoi?

When you say that, you mean if we have to,
you’re even ready to fight Aoi?
Yeah...that’s what I mean.
I hope it doesn’t come to that, but...

If it does, my priority is to protect Miu...
and all of you.
I...feel the same way.
Aoi can’t kill Miyuki.

You mean you’re prepared to do whatever it
takes to keep Aoi from killing Miyuki, right?
Right!

And not just ’cause we gotta rescue Miyuki if
we want to go home.
I also don’t want Aoi to hurt anyone else.

So we gotta do whatever it takes to stop her
from completely losing it!
You said it!
I don’t know if I am.

When it comes right down to it, I don’t know
if I’ll be able to do it...
You know, beat up Aoi...

Well, if it’s too much for you, you can count
on me.
So don’t worry.
Kaito...

Really, I wish I’d been more of a help to
her, before it came to this.
You did plenty to help Aoi, Kaito.

I don’t know what you’re talking about. I was
no help at all.

Saki was the only one who could do anything
for Aoi.

Aoi was always going on about how she wanted
to be like Saki, you know?

She wanted to be strong like Saki. I guess
she wanted that so bad, she got mixed up.

I mean, how stupid can you get? Aoi always
seemed plenty strong to me!
Yeah, me too.

She may not have been as blunt as Saki, or as
quick to act on how she felt,

but she was our leader. She was tireless,
honest, and never gave up on anyone.

She even tried to get through to our enemies!
I always thought that made her strong.
I know, right? And now look what’s happened.

It’s not even like her wanting to make
everybody “one” is so wrong, you know?

Yeah. Trying to get people to understand and
empathize with one another isn’t wrong.

The problem is she wants to do it by
destroying the Master, Miyuki, and the wor—
Wha—?!
Wh-what was that?

Looks like I got a text, but...I don’t get
it, why now?

Yeah, come to think of it, it’s been a while
since we got any of those garbled messages.
You know, you’re right.

Hey, what the—?! I feel like I can almost
make this one out...
Really? Let me see...

(Looks like something about picking up Miu
and buying milk?)

Wow, you’re right! Some parts are still
garbled, but this is way better than before!
Why is this happening?
Don’t ask me.
